title: iPod Nano
overview: The small iPod with one big idea: video. The world's most popular music player now lets you enjoy movies, TV shows, and more on a brighter, high-resolution display.
details: Compact design with a 2-inch display, 65% brighter than previous models.
Cover Flow allows easy browsing of music collection by album art.
Enhanced interface provides a seamless music and video browsing experience.
Sleek and colorful anodized aluminum and polished stainless steel enclosure.
Seamless integration with iTunes for managing music, movies, TV shows, and audiobooks.
Syncs easily with an iPod or iPhone for a streamlined experience.

specifications.Battery Life: Up to 24 hours audio playback, 5 hours video playback
specifications.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, WAV, AIFF, Apple Lossless
